step1.title: Step 1: Create Your Room
step1.description: Click the 'Create Room' button, configure settings like name, voting method, and timer, then finalize by hitting 'Create'.

step2.title: Step 2: Invite Your Team
step2.description: Copy the room link or send invitations directly via email or chat to quickly bring your team onboard.

step3.title: Step 3: Add and Manage Tasks
step3.description: Manually add tasks or import them easily. Edit task details and descriptions to keep everything clear and organized.

step4.title: Step 4: Estimate and Vote
step4.description: Team members select story points using methods like Fibonacci. Reveal, discuss, and finalize votes effortlessly.

step5.title: Step 5: Learn and Grow
step5.description: Explore the Learning Hub to dive deeper into Agile practices and Scrum techniques with curated articles and resources.

step6.title: Step 6: Get Started!
step6.description: You're ready! Click 'Start Using ScrumPilot' or revisit this onboarding anytime to sharpen your skills.
